problem_text_en: Given K is the midpoint of GI. K is the midpoint of HJ and GI . Complete the proof that IJ∥GH . (Elements:  △IJK ,  HK ,  JK ,  ∠GHK ,  IJ ,  GH ,  ∠GKH ,  △GHK ,  GK ,  ∠IKJ ,  ∠IJK ,  IK , )
